title: Is it required to wear uniforms at PES?
content:
Hi,  I am a person who is enrolling for the 
B. Com (hons) ACCA program at PES.  I just wanted to know whether we have to wear uniforms. I am bit doubtful regarding this because I recently attended a zoom meeting where they said we have to wear uniforms.

comments.body: Alright, can you pls tell me what kind of uniform it is?
Bro, if they said it clearly, why do you have a doubt?
